description: John Edmond Owens (1823-1886), American actor; standing white-haired man with glasses, scowling; wearing an overcoat and striped vest with his PL hand on hip holding hat and leaning on an umbrella with his PR hand
markings: [\"Why Mr. Winslow, how do you do?\'\'], printed in black, below image; [Gurney & Son Photo. N.Y.], printed in brown, below title; [PHOTOGRAPHIC ARTISTS./J. GURNEY & SON,/707/BROADWAY,/N.Y.], in black, inside an oval-shaped belt topped with an eagle, at center on back
title: "Why Mr. Winslow, how do you do?"
